thread.title: Mahindra's Mojo ABS Expected to Arrive in Coming Months
thread.title_full: Mahindra's Mojo ABS Expected to Arrive in Coming Months

title: Mahindra's Mojo ABS Expected to Arrive in Coming Months
text:
Mahindra's Mojo ABS Expected to Arrive in Coming Months 24th, Oct 2015 4:15 PM View: 69 (1 rate) 
Indian automobile manufacturing company Mahindra , for the first time showcased its bike in Auto Expo back in 2010. Now, the bike is all set to hit the Indian roads. The company has announced to launch it this month. But interestingly, this bike seems to be the first motorcycle which is updated even before the launch. The motorcycle is going to be launched after the 5 years of development. Since last five years, countless rumors rolled over the media informing about almost all the technical traits of this motor vehicle. But even this month, when the bike is all set to be launched, upgradations are being done in it. 
Read More : Book Mahindra Mojo for Rs. 10,000 
This time, one of the officials representing the company stated that Mahindra Mojo ABS is under development stage. It was earlier expected that this bike will only be available in non-ABS format. But with this statement, it is clear that it will be available in dual options i.e. with ABS and without ABS. When the ABS enriched bike will be made live in the auto-market, it is not yet clear. 
The company is showing its presence by launching the official website for the access. The website confirms the availability of Mojo in coming days. The company is promoting it with the tag line “ It’s time to answer the call of the road ”. The company further adds on the website that the test rides of the bike are also available even before the launch .
